FROM gettyimages/spark:2.3.1-hadoop-3.0

RUN apt update && apt install --no-install-recommends maven git default-jre default-jdk -y && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*;
RUN git clone https://github.com/apache/mahout.git /mahout
